metadata.name: Service Installed By Unusual Client - Security
metadata.comment: Detects a service installed by a client which has PID 0 or whose parent has PID 0

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (metadata.event_code = 4697 AND process.cpid = 0 AND process.parent_process.pid = 0)

output.summary: Detects a service installed by a client which has PID 0 or whose parent has PID 0
